clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the LightSheer HS Hand Piece as Compared to the LightSheer ET Hand Piece for the Intended Use of Hair Removal and Permanent Hair Reduction
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the LightSheer HS Hand Piece as Compared to the LightSheer ET Hand Piece for the Intended Use of Hair Removal and Permanent Hair Reduction

brief_summary.textblock: To observe the qualitative comparison of follicular damage between treatment with the LightSheer Duet hand pieces (ET and HS) as assessed by horizontal biopsy.

secondary_outcome.measure: Comparison of permanent hair reduction between ET and HS handpieces

biospec_descr.textblock: Biopsied hair follicles retained and analzed through horizontal sectioning and viability staining

study_pop.textblock: 5 Adult male subjects that have sought laser back hair removal
